title: Plant-Based Heaven Green Garden - Food Truck
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, International, Organic, Fast food, Take-out only
description: Vegan food truck at the Sustainability Courtyard of University of Hawai'i at Manoa, starting spring 2016. All home-style recipes, including the green garden burger patties and sauces. No onion, garlic, or additives. Gluten-free and dessert offerings daily.
